input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
AC Compressor w/A/C Repair Kit For Lexus ES300 1994 1995 1996 1997 1998 1999 - BuyAutoParts 60-80129RK NEW

Product keywords:
Guaranteed Exact Fit for easy installation
100% BRAND NEW, premium ISO/TS 16949 quality - tested to meet or exceed OEM specifications
Engineered for superior durability, backed by industry leading warranty
Included in this KIT: 100% BRAND NEW premium quality A/C compressor with clutch ; New accumulator / receiver drier / desiccant ; New expansion device ; Complete vehicle-specific o-ring seal kit ; correct viscosity PAG oil

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The AC Compressor with A/C Repair Kit For Lexus ES300 1994-1996-1997-1998-1999 is a brand-new, premium-quality A/C compressor with a clutch. It is an exact fit for easy installation, as it is engineered for superior durability and backed by an industry-leading warranty. The included components are a 100% BRAND NEW premium quality A/C compressor with a clutch, a new accumulator / receiver drier / desiccant, a new expansion device, a complete vehicle-specific o-ring seal kit, and the correct viscosity PAG oil.
input_text.Response B:
This compressor and repair kit is designed to replace the original equipment manufacturer's compressor in specific vehicle applications. Compressors in this kit are engineered to meet or exceed the performance of the original equipment manufacturer's product and will fit and function properly. This kit is built to industry leading quality standards for reliable performance. The compressor is 100% brand new and is designed to meet or exceed OEM specifications for exact fit and function. All products are covered by a 12-month or 12,000-mile warranty.

If you have any questions or concerns about this product description, please let me know.

label_annotations.factors_b: invents facts about the product, doesn't mention many specs
